About.Hours & facilities: Open by appointment only; closed public holidays. General reference assistance available.

About.Access: Tertiary level education preferred. Advance notice of visit and purpose of research are required. Records generally available for access. Access to closed material may be arranged subject to approval by MCC Museum Director or MCC Committee.

About.Acquisition focus: The MCC Archives reflect the administration of the MCC as a private sporting club, and as an important cricket institution and promoter of a national Australian game.

About.Major holdings: MCC Administration: Various including minutes, letters, nomination forms, contracts etc 1859-1989 (50m). Melbourne Football Club: Minutes 1820-1950 (3m).

Contact.Street address: Melbourne Cricket Club Museum, Melbourne Cricket Ground, Jolimont Terrace, Jolimont 3002
